#### Setup

```{r setup, include = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(knitr)
library(sf)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
library(leaflet)
library(shiny)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(rgeoda)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(classInt)
```

#### read in dataset

```{r no ejectment}
evic = read.csv ("./data/evictions_for_Qgis.csv")

```

#### filter

```{r no ejectment}
evic_wo_eject = evic |>
  filter(!(ejectment == "Ejectment"))
  
```
